scripts.test:report:static: npx playwright show-report $(ls -td tests/static/result/*/reports/html 2>/dev/null | head -1 || echo 'tests/static/result')
scripts.test:docker:static: docker-compose run --rm playwright-test npx playwright test --project=static-land
scripts.test:docker:dynamic: docker-compose run --rm playwright-test npx playwright test --project=dynamic-maze
scripts.test:docker:client: docker-compose run --rm playwright-test npx playwright test --project=client-shadow
scripts.test:docker:antibot: docker-compose run --rm playwright-test npx playwright test --project=bot-warden
scripts.test:docker:all: docker-compose up -d app && docker-compose run --rm playwright-test && docker-compose down
scripts.ci:test: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:playwright
scripts.ci:full: npm run ci:test && npm run ci:docker-test
scripts.ci:test-production: docker run --rm -d --name test-local -p 3000:3000 metacrawlable:local && sleep 10 && curl -f http://localhost:3000/api/health && docker stop test-local
